Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This unique item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled value. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and the time invested in its creation, we're offering this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $15000. We're confident that this investment will pay dividends in the long run. Should you have any questions or require further details, please don't hesitate to reach out. We look forward to potentially working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
